name: Little Astronaut
description:
Little Astronaut is an environmental-themed video survival game based on the harsh environment of the Earth and global pandemics. The background of the game is a planet in outer space. As an astronaut on an exploration mission, the player is looking for ways to save the Earth's increasingly lousy environment and the crisis of the epidemic.

 In the game, players collect stars to exchange for supplies from the store and put flowers and garbage into the conversion unit to create a cure to improve the Earth's environment. The game consists of collecting, planting, and buying actions. As the player seeks and makes a cure for the Earth, the Earth changes from black to Earth as it is.

Players will learn from this game that the health of the Earth is essential, and we should take responsibility for protecting the Earth. Let games not only entertain but also educate and inspire.
